1001111000100010 0111111011011110 0 -> sum: 0001110100000000, cout: 1
1010110001011101 1011011000000000 1 -> sum: 0110001001011110, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
